Damage Dealer.description: Damage Dealer: This hero excels at dealing damage, increasing final damage by 3%.

Burst Damage.description: Burst Damage: This hero specializes in using skills to inflict high burst damage in a short period.

Multi-Target.description: Multi-target: This hero specializes in dealing area-of-effect (AoE) damage.

Tank.description: Tank: This hero excels at tanking damage in the front row, reducing damage taken by 5%.

Control.description: Control: This hero is capable of controlling enemies.

Sustained.description: Sustained: This hero specializes in inflicting special effects on attacks and engaging in sustained combat.

Buff.description: Buff: This hero is able to provide buffs to teammates.

Healer.description: Healer: This hero excels at providing healing supoort, enhancing healing by 5%.

Single Target.description: Single Target: This hero specializes in dealing single-target damage.

Support.description: Supporter: This hero excels at offering strategic assistance, raising maximum HP by 5%.

Debuff.description: Debuff: This hero is capable of inflicting debuffs to enemies.

Summoner.description: Summon: This hero can summon units to join the battle
